info.description: A developer friendly API to help your business achieve VAT compliance
info.title: VAT API

parameters.description: The default response type is application/json if you would like to receive an XML response then set this to XML
parameters.name: Response-Type

parameters.description: The 2 digit country code
parameters.name: code

applies_to.description: The type of goods the rate applies to
The type of goods the rate applies to
The type of goods the rate applies to
The type of goods the rate applies to

vat_applies.description: TRUE or FALSE, depending if country is within the EU.

get.summary: Retrieve a countries VAT rates by its 2 digit country code

parameters.description: The default response type is application/json if you would like to receive an XML response then set this to XML
parameters.name: Response-Type

parameters.description: The IP address to search against
parameters.name: address

applies_to.description: The type of goods the rate applies to
The type of goods the rate applies to
The type of goods the rate applies to
The type of goods the rate applies to

vat_applies.description: TRUE or FALSE, depending if country is within the EU.

get.summary: Retrieve a countries VAT rates from an IP address

parameters.description: The default response type is application/json if you would like to receive an XML response then set this to XML
parameters.name: Response-Type

parameters.description: Enter invoice data as JSON
parameters.name: body

conversion_rate.description: The rate of conversion at time of supply

currency_code_conversion.description: 3 character currency code to be converted from original transaction currency

customer_name.description: Your customers name or trading name

date.description: The date the invoice was issued

items.description: An array of your invoice items

price_each.description: The price of the individual item (Ex VAT)

vat_rate.description: The VAT rate at which the item is charged

notes.description: Add a note to the invoice.

price_type.description: Optional, if the price is including VAT set the type to 'incl'. Otherwise the default is assumed as excluding VAT already, 'excl'

tax_point.description: (or 'time of supply') if this is different from the invoice date

type.description: The type of invoice. Either 'sale' or 'refund'

zero_rated.description: To Zero-Rate the VAT, set to true.

vat_rate.description: The VAT rate at which the item is charged

logo_url.description: A URL to your logo image. Must be SSL hosted. https://sslimagehost.com is recommended

notes.description: Any notes attached to the invoice

tax_point.description: (or 'time of supply') if this is different from the invoice date

type.description: The type of invoice. Either 'sale' or 'refund'

get.summary: Check api requests remaining on current subscription plan

get.description: We highly recommend if you are able, to check a VAT number on your end first to save wasted API lookups. It maybe that your customer has simply entered the wrong format. Heres a client side way to check the format using Javascript

parameters.description: The default response type is application/json if you would like to receive an XML response then set this to XML
parameters.name: Response-Type

parameters.description: The VAT number to validate
parameters.name: vatid

parameters.description: The default response type is application/json if you would like to receive an XML response then set this to XML
parameters.name: Response-Type

parameters.description: The 2 digit country code
parameters.name: code

parameters.description: The VAT rate to get the price for. Default: standard
parameters.name: country_rate

parameters.description: The price you want converting
parameters.name: price

parameters.description: Optional, if the price is including VAT set the type to 'incl'. Otherwise the default is assumed as excluding VAT already, 'excl'
parameters.name: type

vat.description: The total amount of VAT applied

get.summary: Convert a price to or from VAT price.

parameters.description: The default response type is application/json if you would like to receive an XML response then set this to XML
parameters.name: Response-Type
